channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A government watchdog that was fired by Trump is trying to protect tens of thousands of federal workers from latest culling
item.description: The Office of Special Counsel’s findings could have major implications for fired federal workers trying to get their jobs back.

item.title: The top 10 car picks for 2025, as selected by Consumer Reports
item.description: Six of them are hybrids—and there’s one EV.

item.title: Eli Lilly trims price of weight-loss drug Zepbound for out-of-pocket payers
Elon Musk says federal workers have one more chance to list their accomplishments via email: ‘Failure to respond a second time will result in termination’
item.description: "The email request was utterly trivial, as the standard for passing the test was to type some words and press send!" Musk said.

item.title: Tesla sales across Europe have been halved this year
Inflation and tariffs factor as consumer confidence falls to eight-month low
Train robbers have stolen nearly $2 million worth of rare Nike sneakers over the past year
item.description: Thefts have occurred in Arizona and California over the past year.

item.title: Krispy Kreme’s stock risks all-time low after 12% skid in premarket trading
What Warren Buffett is really thinking about the stock market
Bill Ackman urges everyone to buy this book: ‘The earlier you read this, the better your life will be,’ he says
item.description: Billionaires like Tim Cook are raving about the book, which reframes wealth to include social, time, mental, and physical prosperity.
